list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update workspace.xml for improved task management
Simplified task comments in workspace.xml and added new tasks with summaries for better clarity. Refactored type annotations and included more helpful messages to assist in task tracking and code maintenance.

task.summary:
Add login functionality with Selenium tests
Introduced a new Selenium-based login functionality with test cases. Added necessary page objects, custom logging, and utility methods to support element interactions and verifications. Configuration files for project setup and inspections were also included.

Add element interaction and waiting utility methods
Enhanced SeleniumDriver with click and wait utilities for elements. New methods include `click_element` and `wait_for_element` to improve element interaction and synchronization on the web page. Updated import statements and type annotations to support these functionalities.

Enhance click_element with detailed error handling
Added comprehensive exception handling to `click_element` for better debugging and robustness. New exceptions handled include `ElementNotInteractableException` and `StaleElementReferenceException`, with corresponding error messages to diagnose issues effectively.

Add send_keys_element method to SeleniumDriver
Introduced a new method, `send_keys_element`, for sending text to web elements. This method includes comprehensive exception handling for various scenarios such as element not found, not interactable, or stale reference, ensuring better debugging and robustness. Updated existing documentation format for consistency.

Add logging integration and enhance login tests
Integrated custom logging throughout SeleniumDriver and login tests. Logging provides detailed visibility and error handling for web element interactions. Refactored login tests to improve maintainability and added tests for invalid login scenarios.

Refactor login tests and integrate custom logging
Added pytest fixtures for setup and teardown in login tests, removing direct WebDriver interactions. Introduced custom logging for better visibility into test execution and error handling. Removed deprecated automation log file and enhanced WebDriverFactory configuration for multiple browsers.

Refactor type hints and minor renaming in selenium_driver
Added proper type hints to `get_element` and `get_elements` methods for clearer function signatures. Renamed `is_element_presented` to `is_element_present` and `are_elements_presented` to `are_elements_present` for consistency. Additionally, removed unused imports in the login_tests.py and conftest.py files.

Enhance logging and test status handling
Added customizable log filenames to `custom_logger`. Introduced `TestStatus` class for detailed pass/fail logging. Updated `login_page.py` for more robust login verification methods.

Add screenshot functionality to SeleniumDriver
Implemented a method to capture and store screenshots in a defined directory. Included exception handling for potential errors during the screenshot saving process.

Update login tests to use environment variables
Replaced hardcoded credentials with environment variables to enhance security. Updated test status messages for consistency. Added logging and screenshot capture for enhanced debugging.

Enhance login tests with comments and update task management
Added docstrings to clarify the purpose of the login tests. Improved test status messages for better readability. Updated task management comments in workspace.xml for better tracking.
Refactor type annotations and improve code clarity
Add type hints and browser option help text

Update workspace.xml for improved task management
Simplified task comments in workspace.xml and added new tasks with summaries for better clarity. Refactored type annotations and included more helpful messages to assist in task tracking and code maintenance.

MESSAGE.value:
Add login functionality with Selenium tests
Introduced a new Selenium-based login functionality with test cases. Added necessary page objects, custom logging, and utility methods to support element interactions and verifications. Configuration files for project setup and inspections were also included.

Add element interaction and waiting utility methods
Enhanced SeleniumDriver with click and wait utilities for elements. New methods include `click_element` and `wait_for_element` to improve element interaction and synchronization on the web page. Updated import statements and type annotations to support these functionalities.

Enhance click_element with detailed error handling
Added comprehensive exception handling to `click_element` for better debugging and robustness. New exceptions handled include `ElementNotInteractableException` and `StaleElementReferenceException`, with corresponding error messages to diagnose issues effectively.

Add send_keys_element method to SeleniumDriver
Introduced a new method, `send_keys_element`, for sending text to web elements. This method includes comprehensive exception handling for various scenarios such as element not found, not interactable, or stale reference, ensuring better debugging and robustness. Updated existing documentation format for consistency.

Add logging integration and enhance login tests
Integrated custom logging throughout SeleniumDriver and login tests. Logging provides detailed visibility and error handling for web element interactions. Refactored login tests to improve maintainability and added tests for invalid login scenarios.

Refactor login tests and integrate custom logging
Added pytest fixtures for setup and teardown in login tests, removing direct WebDriver interactions. Introduced custom logging for better visibility into test execution and error handling. Removed deprecated automation log file and enhanced WebDriverFactory configuration for multiple browsers.

Refactor type hints and minor renaming in selenium_driver
Added proper type hints to `get_element` and `get_elements` methods for clearer function signatures. Renamed `is_element_presented` to `is_element_present` and `are_elements_presented` to `are_elements_present` for consistency. Additionally, removed unused imports in the login_tests.py and conftest.py files.

Enhance logging and test status handling
Added customizable log filenames to `custom_logger`. Introduced `TestStatus` class for detailed pass/fail logging. Updated `login_page.py` for more robust login verification methods.

Add screenshot functionality to SeleniumDriver
Implemented a method to capture and store screenshots in a defined directory. Included exception handling for potential errors during the screenshot saving process.

Update login tests to use environment variables for credentials
Replaced hardcoded email and password in login tests with environment variables to enhance security. Additionally, updated the `test_status.py` to capture screenshots on various exceptions. Removed the `automation.log` and adjusted message formats for better clarity.

Update login tests to use environment variables
Replaced hardcoded credentials with environment variables to enhance security. Updated test status messages for consistency. Added logging and screenshot capture for enhanced debugging.

Enhance login tests with comments and update task management
Added docstrings to clarify the purpose of the login tests. Improved test status messages for better readability. Updated task management comments in workspace.xml for better tracking.
Refactor type annotations and improve code clarity
Add type hints and browser option help text

Update workspace.xml for improved task management
Simplified task comments in workspace.xml and added new tasks with summaries for better clarity. Refactored type annotations and included more helpful messages to assist in task tracking and code maintenance.
